ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: All the authors developed the research concept and designed the methodology. Data obtained in this study were analyzed and interpreted by OOO and COO. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The authors are sincerely grateful to all technologists in the Departments of Chemistry and Microbiology, The Federal University of Technology, Akure for their support during the laboratory work.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All necessary data supporting our findings can be found within the article.

sec.title: Consent for publication
sec.p: All the authors agreed to publish in the journal.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The manuscript is an original research and has not been published in other journal.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
